author: eps1lon
message: [dev-overlay] Fix ref warning when Pages Router with React 18 is used (#77726)

files.patch:

-  blur,
-  side,
-  style,
-  height,
-  ref,

-  height?: number
-  side: 'top' | 'bottom' | 'left' | 'right'

+    className?: string
+    style?: CSSProperties
+  },
+  ref: Ref<HTMLDivElement>
+) {
   return (
     <div
       ref={ref}
